stack:stack.stack:script:
import os.path
if os.path.exists('/tmp/site.attrs'): file = open('/tmp/site.attrs', 'r') for line in file.readlines(): l = line.split(':', 1) if len(l) == 2: # # key/value pairs #
# # there are some attributes that don't belong in the # database # key = l[0].strip()
if key in [ 'hostname', 'rack', 'rank', 'os', 'nukedisks', 'nukecontroller' ]: continue
v = l[1].strip() value = '' for i in v: if i == "'": value += "'" value += '"' value += "\\'" value += '"' value += "'" else: value += i
if key in [ 'Kickstart_PrivatePortableRootPassword', \ 'Kickstart_PrivateRootPassword', \ 'Kickstart_PrivateDjangoRootPassword' ]: extra = 'shadow=y' else: extra = ''
os.system("/opt/stack/bin/stack set attr %s attr='%s' value='%s'" % (extra, key, value))
file.close()

/opt/stack/bin/stack set access command='*' group='apache' /opt/stack/bin/stack set access command='list*' group='wheel'
/opt/stack/bin/stack add box default os=sles /opt/stack/bin/stack add box sles12 os=sles
/opt/stack/bin/stack add appliance frontend longname=Frontend node=server public=false /opt/stack/bin/stack add appliance builder longname=Builder node=builder public=false /opt/stack/bin/stack add appliance backend longname=Backend node=backend
/opt/stack/bin/stack set attr attr=firewall value=true
/opt/stack/bin/stack set attr attr=managed value=false
/opt/stack/bin/stack set appliance attr frontend attr=managed value=false /opt/stack/bin/stack set appliance attr backend attr=managed value=true
/opt/stack/bin/stack add network private \ address=&Kickstart_PrivateNetwork; \ mask=&Kickstart_PrivateNetmask; \ zone=&Kickstart_PrivateDNSDomain; \ gateway=&Kickstart_PrivateGateway; \ dns=false pxe=true
/opt/stack/bin/stack set attr attr=os value=&os;
/opt/stack/bin/stack add bootaction default type=os os=sles \ kernel="com32 chain.c32" args=hd0
/opt/stack/bin/stack add bootaction pxeflash type=os os=sles \ kernel="kernel memdisk bigraw" ramdisk=pxeflash.img args=keeppxe
/opt/stack/bin/stack add bootaction localboot type=os os=sles \ kernel="localboot 0"
/opt/stack/bin/stack add bootaction hplocalboot type=os os=sles \ kernel="localboot -1"
/opt/stack/bin/stack add bootaction memtest type=os os=sles \ kernel="kernel memtest"
/opt/stack/bin/stack add bootaction "default" \ os=sles type=install \ kernel="vmlinuz-sles-12-x86_64" \ ramdisk=initrd-sles-12-x86_64 \ args="install=http://&Kickstart_PrivateAddress;/install/pallets/SLES/12/sp2/sles/x86_64 autoyast=file:///tmp/profile/autoinst.xml ramdisk_size=300000 biosdevname=0 Server=&Kickstart_PrivateAddress;"
/opt/stack/bin/stack add bootaction "console" \ os=sles type=install \ kernel="vmlinuz-sles-12-x86_64" \ ramdisk=initrd-sles-12-x86_64 \ args="install=http://&Kickstart_PrivateAddress;/install/pallets/SLES/12/sp2/sles/x86_64 autoyast=file:///tmp/profile/autoinst.xml ramdisk_size=300000 biosdevname=0 Server=&Kickstart_PrivateAddress; console=ttyS1,115200n"
/opt/stack/bin/stack add bootaction "rescue" \ os=sles type=install \ kernel="vmlinuz-sles-12-x86_64" \ ramdisk=initrd-sles-12-x86_64 \ args="splash=silent rescue=1 showopts brokenmodules=mptfc,qla2xxx,mpt2sas,mpt3sas,mlx4_core,mlx4_ib,mlx4_en,mlx5_core,mlx5_ib"
/opt/stack/bin/stack add bootaction "install sles 11.3" \ os=sles type=install \ kernel=vmlinuz-sles-11.3-x86_64 \ ramdisk=initrd-sles-11.3-x86_64 \ args="install=http://&Kickstart_PrivateAddress;/install/pallets/SLES/11.3/1.138/sles/x86_64 autoyast=file:///tmp/profile/autoinst.xml ramdisk_size=300000 biosdevname=0"
/opt/stack/bin/stack add bootaction "install sles 11.3 console" \ os=sles type=install \ kernel=vmlinuz-sles-11.3-x86_64 \ ramdisk=initrd-sles-11.3-x86_64 \ args="install=http://&Kickstart_PrivateAddress;/install/pallets/SLES/11.3/1.138/sles/x86_64 autoyast=file:///tmp/profile/autoinst.xml ramdisk_size=300000 biosdevname=0 console=ttyS1,115200n"
/opt/stack/bin/stack add bootaction "rescue sles 11.3" \ os=sles type=install \ kernel=vmlinuz-sles-11.3-x86_64 \ ramdisk=initrd-sles-11.3-x86_64 \ args="splash=silent rescue=1 showopts brokenmodules=mptfc,qla2xxx,mpt2sas,mpt3sas,mlx4_core,mlx4_ib,mlx4_en,mlx5_core,mlx5_ib"
/opt/stack/bin/stack add host &Kickstart_PrivateHostname; \ appliance=frontend rack=0 rank=0
/opt/stack/bin/stack add route address=224.0.0.0 gateway=private netmask=255.255.255.0
/opt/stack/bin/stack add route address=255.255.255.255 gateway=private netmask=255.255.255.255
/opt/stack/bin/stack add host interface &Kickstart_PrivateHostname; \ network=private \ interface=&Kickstart_PrivateInterface; \ mac=&Kickstart_PrivateEthernet; \ ip=&Kickstart_PrivateAddress; \ name=&Kickstart_PrivateHostname;
/opt/stack/bin/stack set host interface default &Kickstart_PrivateHostname; \ interface=&Kickstart_PrivateInterface; \ default=true
/opt/stack/bin/stack set attr attr=ssh.use_dns value=true /opt/stack/bin/stack set attr attr=sync.ssh.authkey value=true
/opt/stack/bin/stack set attr attr=discovery.base.rank value=0 /opt/stack/bin/stack set attr attr=discovery.base.rack value=0
rm /tmp/my.cnf
/opt/stack/bin/stack report host > /etc/hosts
